tweet: I have a hobby.. hookah.  I just started hookahthat.com to bring together hookah enthusiasts.  Now off to smoke a celebration bowl... :)
@SensualJ Yea.. Guava is a great flavor!  Have u tried Pomegranate?  Its good too!  My fav changes alot... right now it's honeydew melon :)
@J_Honey11  :) Life is good... so follow me back!  What's your favorite hookah flavor?
I will be GIVING AWAY FREE HOOKAH STUFF to my followers often... just for the hell of it! How does free Starbuzz sound? Tune in next week...
@Caitlin605 Thanks for the shout out... Follow me back :)  What's your favorite hookah bar in NY?
